nasha_dashboard_partition_snapshots_desc: Easily create and manage your snapshot policies, in terms of frequency and retention periods. You can then apply them to specific volumes. Snapshots use your HA-NAS solutionâ€™s storage capacity.
nasha_dashboard_partition_snapshots_crea: Authorised: Alpha-numeric characters, full stops, colons and hyphens
nasha_dashboard_partition_snapshots_warn: You get an additional 20% more space for your snapshots.
If you exceed this storage space, the snapshots will be stored on your primary storage space.
